name: knjSQLAdmin

screenshots.caption: Choosing a database-profile. More than one can be choosen.
Viewing the list of tables and the columns to the right.

short_description: A graphical tool to manipulate and work with databases. This program is able to transfer tables between database-types via drag'n'drop from one type of database (ig MySQL) to another (ig SQLite).
